joy.title: Share Your Joy
joy.description: Call a friend or family member and share your happiness with them.

joy.title: Random Act of Kindness
joy.description: Do something nice for a stranger today to spread your positive energy.

joy.title: Gratitude Journal
joy.description: Write down three things you're grateful for to maintain this positive feeling.

sadness.title: Self-Care Time
sadness.description: Take a warm bath or shower and focus on physical comfort.

sadness.title: Nature Walk
sadness.description: Spend 15 minutes outside in nature to lift your spirits.

sadness.title: Creative Expression
sadness.description: Draw, write, or play music to express and process your feelings.

fear.title: Deep Breathing
fear.description: Practice 4-7-8 breathing: inhale for 4, hold for 7, exhale for 8 seconds.

fear.title: Face a Small Fear
fear.description: Do one small thing today that scares you to build confidence.

fear.title: Visualization
fear.description: Spend 5 minutes imagining yourself successfully handling what you fear.

anger.title: Physical Release
anger.description: Go for a run or do some push-ups to release the tension.

anger.title: Mindful Pause
anger.description: Count to 10 slowly before responding to what's making you angry.

anger.title: Write It Out
anger.description: Write an unsent letter expressing your feelings without filter.

disgust.title: Clean Space
disgust.description: Tidy up your environment to create a sense of order and freshness.

disgust.title: Sensory Reset
disgust.description: Smell something pleasant like essential oils or fresh air.

disgust.title: Perspective Shift
disgust.description: List three positive aspects of something you find unpleasant.

surprise.title: Embrace Spontaneity
surprise.description: Do something unplanned today that breaks your routine.

surprise.title: Learn Something New
surprise.description: Spend 15 minutes researching a topic you know nothing about.

surprise.title: Mystery Activity
surprise.description: Ask a friend to plan a small activity for you without telling you what it is.

anticipation.title: Plan Something Fun
anticipation.description: Schedule an activity you'll look forward to in the coming days.

anticipation.title: Vision Board
anticipation.description: Create a visual representation of things you're looking forward to.

anticipation.title: Countdown Timer
anticipation.description: Set a timer for something you're excited about and check it regularly.

trust.title: Trust Exercise
trust.description: Delegate a task to someone else without micromanaging them.

trust.title: Reflect on Trust
trust.description: Write down three people you trust completely and why you trust them.

trust.title: Trust Yourself
trust.description: Make a decision you've been postponing and commit to it.

love.title: Express Affection
love.description: Tell someone you care about exactly what you appreciate about them.

love.title: Self-Love Ritual
love.description: Do something kind for yourself that you normally wouldn't make time for.

love.title: Love Letter
love.description: Write a letter (to send or keep) expressing your feelings for someone special.

optimism.title: Future Journaling
optimism.description: Write about your ideal future as if it's already happening.

optimism.title: Opportunity Finder
optimism.description: Identify three opportunities in a current challenge you're facing.

optimism.title: Positive News
optimism.description: Seek out and read three positive news stories today.

anxiety.title: Grounding Exercise
anxiety.description: Practice the 5-4-3-2-1 technique: name 5 things you see, 4 you feel, 3 you hear, 2 you smell, and 1 you taste.

anxiety.title: Worry Time
anxiety.description: Schedule a specific 15-minute period to focus on your worries, then let them go outside that time.

anxiety.title: Progressive Muscle Relaxation
anxiety.description: Tense and then release each muscle group in your body, starting from your toes and working upward.
